title: AI/ML-utvecklare till Softhouse
description:
Är du en erfaren AI/ML-utvecklare som vill utveckla lösningar som gör skillnad? Är du prestigelös och vill jobba med likasinnade kollegor som värdesätter kunskapsdelning? Då kan vi vara en bra match!
  
Vad vi kommer att göra tillsammans Som AI/ML-utvecklare på Softhouse hjälper du våra kunder att planera och realisera sina projekt, i olika leveranser och kunduppdrag. Du tar fram Proof-of-Concepts och utvecklar lösningar, från datahantering till ML-träning och deploy. Du bidrar också med teknisk expertis vid pre-sales och införsäljning med potentiella kunder.
  
Vårt AI-team arbetar både självständigt och tillsammans i leveranser, och träffas regelbundet för att diskutera problem och dela kunskap. Här ges du utrymme och möjlighet att vara med och utveckla Softhouse erbjudande inom AI.
  
Vad vi söker hos dig För oss handlar det inte bara om antal års erfarenhet, utan också om att du är kommunikativ, lyhörd och driven med en fallenheten att agera förtroendeingivande gentemot våra kunder. Rollen kräver ett stort mått av självständighet samtidigt som det är viktigt att kunna samarbeta och kommunicera kring arbetet. För att lyckas i rollen ser vi även gärna att du har:
  
Minst fem års erfarenhet av AI/ML-utveckling med Python. Kanske har du efter din master arbetat i en liknande roll, eller så har du fått din erfarenhet genom PhD inom relevant område. Extra meriterande med kunskap i bibliotek så som Numpy, Scipy och Matplotlib.
  
Förmåga och vilja att hålla muntliga presentationer och skriva rapporter.
  
Stor kunskap inom Machine Learning, Deep Learning, och Computer Vision. Speciellt konvolutionella neurala nätverk.
  
Du kan oberoende läsa och sätta dig in i forskningsartiklar.
  
**Erfarenhet i flera, men inte nödvändigtvis alla, av följande:** Linjär algebra, signalbehandling, algoritmutveckling, statistik, JIRA, Git
  
  

Vad vi erbjuder
  
Ett stabilt och välmående bolag där du och din work-life balance är i fokus
  
Möjlighet att vara med och driva och utveckla den interna kompetensen inom AI på Softhouse
  
En mix av spännande inhouseprojekt och teamleveranser tillsammans med dina Softhouse-kollegor samt externa uppdrag
  
Skräddarsydd utvecklingsplan och aktiv kunskapsdelning med andra Softhouse-kollegor
  
Ett team som gillar att göra saker tillsammans för att förhöja vardagen - allt från hälsofrämjande aktiviteter till gemensamma frukostar och aw’s
  
Ett värderingsstyrt bolag där vi alla känner igen oss i våra värdeord: Team, Enkelhet, Mod och Passion
  
  

Låter det intressant? Skicka in din ansökan!

title: AI-utvecklare
description:
Är du en AI/ML-utvecklare med bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling? Är du prestigelös och vill jobba med likasinnade kollegor som värdesätter kunskapsdelning och ha roligt på jobbet? Då hade du gillat oss på Softhouse!
  
Vad vi kommer att göra tillsammans
  
AI och Machine Learning blir allt viktigare i många av våra projekt. Som AI-utvecklare bidrar du och leder regionens arbete inom AI/ML-området och delar din tid i flera aktiviteter. Vi tror att dina arbetsuppgifter kan se ut såhär:
  
I tidiga faser av projekt, som t.ex. införsäljning och förstudier, bidrar du med att se potential, affärsmöjligheter och hjälper kunden att förstå AI.
  
Du tar fram Proof-of-Concepts och utvecklar lösningar, från datahantering till ML-träning och deploy.
  
I utvecklingsfasen bidrar du hands-on och driver arbetet med att integrera AI samt stötta våra utvecklare och kunder.
  
I projektens slutfas hjälper du till med lösningar och rutiner för att säkerställa långsiktig förvaltning av modeller och dataflöden.
  
  

Då området är nytt för oss i regionen kommer du att vara först in på rollen lokalt, men ingår i koncernens AI-grupp med fler kollegor från olika kontor. Vi ser flera möjligheter där du också kommer kunna bidra lokalt genom att:
  
Tillföra kunskap till vårt Business Intelligence team kring AI/Data engineering.
  
Hämta inspiration och kunskap från t.ex. lokala nätverk, för att sedan sprida vidare på vårt kontor i form av workshops, föreläsningar samt i projekten.
  
  

Om dig
  
För oss handlar det inte bara om antal års erfarenhet - vi värdesätter vår konsultmässighet och hur vi agerar mot varandra i team och i dialog med kund. Vi tror att du är kommunikativ och lyhörd, och agerar förtroendeingivande gentemot både kund och kollegor. Du har driv och förmåga att ta dig an varierande roller, viljan att söka förbättring, lyfta teamet runt dig och hjälpa kollegor att växa.
  
  

**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi gärna att du har:**  

Ca 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet från liknande roll och vana att arbeta med hantering och analys av data.
  
Akademisk utbildning inom relevant område.
  
Solida kunskaper inom tekniker för Deep learning, Neurala Nätverk och optimering av modeller för effektiv hantering.
  
God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.
  
  

Vad du får hos oss
  
På Softhouse blir du en del av ett framåtsträvande bolag med korta beslutsvägar och högt i tak. Vi är prestigelösa teamspelare och drivs av att leverera produkter, tjänster och mjukvara av högsta kvalitet. Och, förutom kollegor i världsklass och garanterat roligt på jobbet, erbjuder vi även:
  
Möjlighet att vara med och forma strategi och lokalt erbjudande för hur vi arbetar med AI i Sydost-regionen.
  
Möjlighet att utmanas tekniskt med kompetenta kollegor i en mix av kunduppdrag och leveransmodeller.
  
Individuellt anpassad kompetensutveckling och aktiv kunskapsdelning med andra Softhouse-kollegor, både lokalt och över kontoren.
  
En given plats i ett tight team som gillar att ha roligt tillsammans på jobbet, varje dag. Vi gillar aw’s, spelkvällar, årlig kräftskiva, konferens- och skidresa och andra hälsofrämjande aktiviteter!
  
Ett värderingsstyrt bolag där vi alla känner igen oss i våra värdeord: Team, Enkelhet, Mod och Passion.
  
  

Om Softhouse På Softhouse är vi ca 300 medarbetare fördelade på 10 kontor. I region Sydost hittar du oss på våra kontor i Karlskrona och Karlshamn, där vi idag är runt 70 kollegor. Vi har kodat mjukvara sedan 1996, och tillsammans ser vi till att skapa lösningar som motsvarar våra kunders behov och överträffar deras förväntningar - vi levererar tjänster och mjukvara i världsklass.
  
Låter det intressant? Då ser vi fram emot att ta del av din ansökan och lära känna dig bättre!

title: Junior systemutvecklare till SCB
description:
Är du handlingskraftig, samhällsintresserad och nyfiken på att lära dig nya saker kommer du förmodligen att trivas på SCB. Vi är landets största och främsta kunskapskälla inom statistik och följaktligen en mycket lärorik arbetsplats. Vårt arbete är viktigt på riktigt. Välkommen till en öppen och prestigelös arbetsplats med hjälpsamma kollegor!
  
  

Kika in på scb.se/jobb och få reda på mer om oss!
  
  

Om jobbet
  
Vill du vara med och utveckla system för statistikproduktion som ligger till grund för viktiga beslut inom både politik och näringsliv? Vill du utvecklas tillsammans med kunniga kollegor och ha möjlighet att bidra till viktiga samhällsprojekt? Hos oss kommer du att tillhöra IT-avdelningen i Örebro, med cirka 140 engagerade kollegor, och ansvara för de system som möjliggör denna statistikproduktion. I en värld där det blir allt svårare att veta vilken information man kan lita på, är vårt uppdrag att styra mot framtiden med hjälp av fakta viktigare än någonsin.
  
  

Vi söker nu 1-3 systemutvecklare till vår IT-utvecklingsenhet, som arbetar både med förvaltning och nyutveckling. Är du en nyfiken och engagerad systemutvecklare som är relativt ny i din roll? Du kanske nyligen har börjat arbeta som systemutvecklare eller har jobbat ett par år. Vill du vara en del av ett fantastiskt team med mycket samlad erfarenhet där du kan växa och utvecklas i din roll och samtidigt bidra med din kunskap? Då har vi tjänsten för dig!
  
  

**Om rollen:**  

I vårt team kommer du att arbeta med utveckling av kritiska system som gör en verklig skillnad och som är centrala för SCB: s framtida statistikproduktionsprocess.
  
  

Du kommer att delta i teamets utvecklings- och förvaltningsarbete. Som junior utvecklare får du en mer senior utvecklare som mentor. Mentorn är till för att stötta dig i att på bästa sätt komma in i arbetet, teamet och systemen.
  
  

Teamen förvaltar ofta en stor och varierad systemflora. Därför är det viktigt att du har en vilja att lära dig och en förmåga att vara flexibel i ditt arbete samt kunna växla mellan olika tekniker. Arbetet kan innebära både stora och små insatser och teamet deltar ibland i större projekt.
  
  

**Vårt arbetssätt:**  

Teambaserat arbete där vi värdesätter samarbete och individuellt ansvar. Möjlighet att arbeta både i grupp och enskilt, med stöd av hela teamet. Vi ser ett värde i att ha teammedlemmar med olika erfarenhetsbakgrund. Vi tillämpar agilt arbetssätt för att snabbt kunna anpassa oss till nya förutsättningar och behov.
  
  

Vill du ...
  
  

* Vara en del av ett engagerat och kompetent agilt team
* Samarbeta med IT-arkitekt, kravanalytiker, testare och engagerade beställare
* Få möjlighet att arbeta med varierande, spännande och meningsfulla arbetsuppgifter
* Arbeta i en kreativ miljö och kultur som uppmuntrar personlig och professionell utveckling
* Utveckla framtidssäkrade IT-lösningar som möjliggör SCB: s viktiga samhällsuppdrag
* Ha goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och prova på olika systemutvecklingsområden


... då tror vi att den här tjänsten kan vara riktigt intressant för dig!
  
  

Om dig
  
  

**Vi vill att du har:**  

* Dataingenjörsexamen, systemvetenskaplig examen eller motsvarande examen som vi bedömer likvärdig
* Arbetslivserfarenhet inom:
* Utveckling i C# .NET
* Utveckling i SQL
* Utveckling för webbklient
* Ett samarbetsverktyg för systemutveckling såsom Azure DevOps server eller Git
* God förmåga att kommunicera i tal och skrift på svenska


Meriterande är om du har arbetslivserfarenhet inom något eller flera av följande tekniker/områden:
  
  

* Javascript/HTML/CSS
* Utveckling i React eller Blazor
* Arbete med api: er
* IT-säkerhet
* WCAG
* Python
* Utveckling av någon AI- eller ML-lösning
* Arbete med enhetstester
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta inom en större och komplex organisation, där samarbete mellan olika roller och funktioner är en central del.


För att det här ska bli en bra matchning för både dig och oss behöver du vara en relationsskapande person med god samarbetsförmåga, eftersom arbetet ställer höga krav på att du ska arbeta tillsammans med andra människor, både inom och utanför teamet, för att uppnå ändamålsenliga resultat. Du är utåtriktad i yrkesmässiga sammanhang, skapar kontakter och underhåller relationer. Du behöver också vara serviceinriktad och ha intresse, vilja och förmåga att hjälpa andra samt anstränga dig för att leverera lösningar. Du är lugn, uppmärksam och tillmötesgående i ditt bemötande. För att kunna leverera behöver du även vara initiativtagande, sätta igång aktiviteter och ha mod att agera utifrån egen övertygelse.
  
  

Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper för att det här ska bli en bra matchning för både dig och oss.
  
  

**Du delar våra förhållningssätt:** mod att agera, tillit till varandras kompetens och goda vilja, handlingskraft att omsätta ord i arbete och var och ens ansvar att bidra till helheten.
  
  

Mer information
  
Den här tjänsten finns på sektion Statistik och analys på IT-utvecklingsenheten i Örebro Åkullegatan 14.
  
  

Utifrån verksamhetens förutsättning finns det möjlighet att även arbeta viss tid hemifrån.
  
  

Anställningen är tillsvidare och inleds vanligtvis med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträdesdatum kommer vi överens om.
  
  

En av tjänsterna är säkerhetsklassad så därför kommer vi att göra en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll innan vi fattar beslut om anställning.
  
  

Vill du veta mer om jobbet, kontakta någon av sektionscheferna Anna Östh tel 010-479 61 07 eller Marie-Joelle Kasto tel 010 479 60 03.
  
  

Fackliga kontaktpersoner
  
Krister Näsén, ST inom SCB, tel 010-479 49 08.
  
Barbro Olsson, Anders Ekwall, Saco-S föreningen vid SCB, tel 010-479 63 11.
  
  

**Sista ansökningsdag:** 2025-04-06.
  
**Diarienummer:** A2025/275.
  
  

Du ansöker genom att registrera personligt brev och CV på svenska i vårt rekryteringssystem som du kommer till när du klickar på ”Ansök” nedan. Du kommer också att få besvara några urvalsfrågor.
  
  

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
  
  

Vi undanber oss kontakt med annonsörer och bemanningsföretag i rekryteringen.

title: Junior Software Developer - AI verktyg
description:
Varje dygn andas du in över 20 000 liter luft och spenderar i genomsnitt 90% av din tid inomhus. Inomhusventilationslösningar påverkar alla – oavsett om du ser våra produkter eller inte. FläktGroup är marknadsledande av innovativa och energieffektiva lösningar för inomhusklimat, som säkerställer komfort, säkerhet och prestanda samtidigt som vi minskar klimatavtrycket. Vi har satt den tekniska standarden i över 100 år och kan med våra breda produktportfölj möta de mest omfattande kundkraven. FläktGroup ägs av Triton och har huvudkontor i Tyskland. Vi är verksamma över hela världen och har produktionsanläggningar i Europa, Asien och USA. Together We Create Excellence. For Life. Läs mer om oss på www.flaktgroup.com

**Om vår funktion**


Software Development är en framåtblickande funktion på FläktGroup! Avdelningen ansvarar för design och utveckling av egenutvecklade webbaserade system avsedda för produktval, konfiguration och AI-baserade verktyg. Vi skapar nu upp en ny grupp inom avdelningen särskilt ägnad åt AI-utveckling där syftet är att utveckla system som med hjälp av AI och maskininlärning ska kunna automatisera och förenkla processer inom företaget. Det är en spännande tid för oss då vi tar till oss nya teknikplattformar och erbjuder Dig en chans att arbeta med banbrytande projekt och kunna utvecklas tillsammans med vårt kompetenta utvecklarteam.

 **Vi erbjuder dig**


Arbetet omfattar allt från större nyutvecklingsprojekt till förvaltning av befintliga system, där teamet ansvarar själva för arkitektur och teknisk utformning av lösningarna. Alla utvecklare på FläktGroup har stora möjligheter att löpande påverka arbetsmetoder och processer. Vi arbetar ’full-stack’, dvs hela kedjan från kravbearbetning till komplett leverans och du kommer ha stora möjligheter att påverka lösningens utformning och att skapa den bästa användarupplevelsen.


Som junior utvecklare i vårt team får du tillsammans med våra erfarna utvecklare och dataanalytiker möjlighet att vara med att utveckla helt nya lösningar baserade på AI och maskininlärning. Det är ett unikt tillfälle att, samtidigt som du bidrar med att utveckla lösningarna, själv utvecklas och skaffa dig erfarenhet inom AI-området.


Rollen har placeringsort Jönköping. Vi erbjuder flexibilitet avseende arbete hemifrån, men då teamet är centralt för vår framgång förväntas du vara på arbetsplatsen ca. 2-3 dagar i veckan.

 **Vem är du**

  



Vi tror att den här rollen är perfekt för dig som är i början av din karriär som utvecklare, med ett intresse av webbapplikationer och databaser samt har ett intresse av att jobba nära AI och egenutvecklade mjukvaruverktyg i ett internationellt företag. Det är viktigt att du gillar att vara en del av ett team och tillsammans med andra utveckla smarta och effektiva lösningar.


Vi söker dig som:

* Har erfarenhet av att programmera i Microsoft .Net, Python, C# och Javascript
* Kunskaper och intresse av AI
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift


Det är meriterande om du även har

  

* Kunskaper MS SQL Server Databasutveckling

Kunskaper i Front End utveckling I React  
* 

**Vårt Löfte**


För oss är det enkelt. För att kunna vara den ledande leverantören av energieffektiva ventilationslösningar är vår tekniska utveckling och våra engagerade medarbetare centrala. På FläktGroup Sweden AB jobbar ca 600 anställda och vi har produktion och utveckling i Jönköping och säljkontor på 16 platser runt om i Sverige. Vi erbjuder spännande utmaningar i en internationell miljö. Här jobbar specialister och generalister inom bland annat försäljning, utveckling, produktion, IT, logistik, marknad och ekonomi. Hos oss på FläktGroup är närheten till våra kunniga medarbetare inom flera yrkesområden en styrka som skapar en tydlig helhet. Här finns en kultur som präglas av laganda och entreprenörskap, där vår vardag kännetecknas av en ambiitiös och flexibel inställning. Vi hjälps tillsammans åt för att hitta den bästa lösningen, oavsett vilka utmaningar vi stöter på. Både i vårt arbete och för våra kunder. För det är tillsammans vi skapar något enastående. För hela livet.

**Övrig information**

  

Om du har frågor är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, Gabriel Jonsson, IT Software Development Manager, gabriel.jonsson@flaktgroup.com. Sista ansökningsdag är 1 april och vi tillämpar löpande urval.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**What we do**


At Helicon, we build digital products that matter. As a digital product development & innovation agency specializing in cleantech, we partner with forward-thinking businesses to build breakthrough digital products, platforms, and capabilities that drive sustainability and efficiency.

**Who we are**


Our journey has taken us from developing one of Sweden’s largest virtual power plants by connecting over 15,000 buildings, to using AI to optimize energy, water, and resource management around the world. We have also helped launch award-winning cleantech startups and SaaS solutions for the energy sector.


But we don’t just measure success by the impact we have on our customers. We measure it by the real-world sustainability gains our solutions create. When our customers tell us that our solutions helped shut down a coal and oil power plant, integrate more renewables into their portfolio, or cut 36,000 tons of CO₂ emissions annually, we take immense pride in that.


What truly drives us is our passion for solving complex challenges together by combining strategy, design, engineering, and data science. At Helicon, speed, curiosity, collaboration, and continuous learning are at the heart of everything we do. If you’re passionate about technology and in using it to make a positive impact on our planet, you’ll fit right in with our team.

**About the role**


As a Fullstack Engineer, you will balance your work between the backend and frontend, collaborating with colleagues on the same project. You'll have a significant technical and organizational impact, driving both solutions and long-term innovative initiatives. You will be involved in the entire product-building journey, from design and development to testing and implementation. It will be fast-paced, challenging, and rewarding.

**What you’ll do;**

* You will typically focus more on the backend stack of a specific project, but there are projects where support on both sides is needed, and front-end focus may shift between projects
* Provide mentoring and drive the team forward in terms of development methodologies
* Rapidly and precisely plan and execute application development projects
* Understand customer’s needs to help define requirements
* Perform constructive code reviews and provide meaningful feedback
* Build and lead development teams and initiatives

**What you’ll bring to the table;**

* 5+ years of experience with a reasonably up-to-date backend stack, preferably with Python, along with experience in frontend development
* Experience with running deployments on AWS and/or Azure
* Strong understanding of Docker and Git
* Fundamental understanding of profiling and performance optimization
* Ability to build applications that can handle large amounts of data while remaining highly responsive
* Strong opinions on how to best connect applications with external APIs
* Able to work in a hybrid setup in Stockholm and fluent in Swedish and English

**What we offer**


At Helicon, you can expect to work alongside truly tech-passionate people every day. What we do has a big impact on building a more efficient future, which gives us pride in our work. We foster a culture of humble collaboration, where we are always eager to learn and innovate. We prioritize balance between your job and private life and regularly host social activities like hackathons, after-work gatherings, yearly conferences, shuffleboard comps, and more!

**Application**


Even if you do not meet all the requirements, we encourage you to apply, as our number one priority is to hire the right people instead of nitty-gritty tech.


Our recruitment process usually consists of a first interview, a technical step followed by a business and culture-focused interview.

title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description:
The Koenigsegg software and electronics department is responsible for designing and developing software and electronics for the in-vehicle infotainment system, electronic control units (ECU) and connected services. We are working very closely with the other engineering departments, production and service/aftersales. We are now looking to expand the infotainment, cloud and mobile app team with a skilled and experienced full-stack web developer.



The focus of this position will be to maintain and further develop a web application with its underlying backend services for our fleet of connected vehicles.



**Responsibilities**


* Development and maintenance of web application and its underlying infrastructure
* Unit testing and regression testing
* Formulate and prototype new concepts
* Support our production and service departments

Skills & Requirements


**Requirements**


* Experience in front-end web development using TypeScript, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and state management systems such as Zustand and the React context API
* Experience with back-end technologies such as NodeJS and NginX
* Experience in relational databases such as PostgreSQL
* Experience with developing security critical software
* Fluency in the English language
* High standards for code quality, usability, maintainability, and performance
* A keen eye for good user interfaces and user experience
* Ability to work in a dynamic ever-changing environment


**Good to have**


* Experience in Cloud infrastructure
* Experience in message brokers such as Kafka or RabbitMQ
* Experience in React Navitve
* Automotive experience is a plus but not essential
* University degree in Computer Science or other relevant education is desirable but not essential
* Experience with relevant standards and regulations such as GDPR, ISO 27000 is a plus
* Experience with agile software development process
Great Place to Work


Opportunity to impact a growing company


Work alongside world-class talent


Flexible work schedules + Culture of collaboration


Long track record of success and profitability


Engaging and sharing work environment


Quick decision making, flat hierarchy


About the company


Koenigsegg is most known for building some of the fastest cars in the world; with almost all of our megacar technologies that are patented and made in-house by our almost 500 world-class technicians, engineers, sourcing experts, production craftsmen, and communicators.


What we’ve created is a unique proving ground of engineering creativity that makes use of our breakthrough megacar development and legacy to push the boundaries of sustainable mobility technology.



So, what’s next?


We are on a universe-denting mission to develop the next generation of breakthrough tech and products. We are looking for outstanding, impactful, and authentic individuals to grow with us. Our ambitions are inspiring but will push the limits of what is possible – requiring one to work efficiently amid our cross-functional teams to execute at high-quality levels.


**The goal is clear: innovate and transform.**

title: Developer ASIC
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About The Opportunity;**

  

Ericsson Silicon develops tailor-made, high-performance solutions for present and future RAN needs. Our (ASICs) power cutting-edge System on a Chip (SoC)—a game-changer in telecommunications. With signal processors (DSPs) and accelerators, our technology enables high-performance, energy-efficient, and lightweight network solutions.

  

We are looking for a talent ASIC IP Verifier with modelling experience and HW (HDL) knowledge to join our team. Whether you specialize in design, verification, or both, you’ll play a crucial role in developing high-performance ASIC IPs and subsystems. This role involves verifying complex digital systems, using MATLAB for system Modelling, performance analysis, and functional validation.

 **Why Choose Ericsson Silicon?**

* **Innovate with Purpose:** Engage in projects that have a tangible impact on society by facilitating advanced connectivity solutions that power smart cities, IoT, and next-gen mobile networks.
* **State-of-the-Art Technology**: Work with the latest advancements in silicon design, leveraging cutting-edge tools and methodologies to create industry-leading ASIC and FPGA solutions.
* **Dynamic and Collaborative Culture**: Be part of a vibrant team that values creativity, innovation, and collaboration. Our diverse and inclusive environment encourages sharing ideas and pushing the limits of what is possible.
* **Global Influence:** Join a company with an extensive global reach, contributing to projects that span continents and touch millions of lives.
* **Continuous Learning and Growth**: Take advantage of ample opportunities for professional development, including training programs, mentorship, and career advancement pathways

 **What You will do**;

* Define and develop ASIC IP block and subsystem models, ensuring high-quality design and verification. Take full responsibility for block/subsystem verification, using MATLAB for system-level validation and algorithm exploration.
* Develop and integrate MATLAB/Simulink Models for system simulation, functional verification, and performance analysis, refining design feasibility before silicon implementation.
* Work closely with architects, designers, and verifiers to optimize design choices, verification strategies, and modelling techniques, ensuring seamless integration.
* Enhance design and verification workflows with MATLAB-based modelling, improve debug cycles, and generate comprehensive documentation to refine methodologies.

 **Skills You Bring;**

* Expertise in Modelling using for instance MATLAB including Simulink for system-level verification and performance estimation.
* Knowledge of RTL development and HDL languages (Verilog, VHDL, SystemVerilog)
* Understanding of hardware verification methodologies, such as UVM, constrained-random testing, and coverage-driven verification.
* Knowledge of testbench development, simulation, debugging test cases, and using EDA tools (Cadence, Synopsys).
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced development environment.
**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


We encourage you to consider applying to jobs where you might not meet all the criteria. We recognize that we all have transferrable skills, and we can support you with the skills that you need to develop.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** [[Sweden]] || [[Lund]]

**Primary Recruiter:** [[Anitha Pulluru]]

**Hiring Manager:** [[Milan Stamenkovic]]

title: FRONTEND DEVELOPER TO NEDERMAN
description:
*Embark on a transformative journey with Nederman, shaping the future of IoT solutions for air filtration systems. As our new Frontend Developer this is your chance to dive into cutting-edge technical innovation, work with highly skilled colleagues in a dynamic team, and elevate your career with us. If you want to contribute to solutions that make a tangible difference in the world, Nederman is the place for you. We go beyond products; we create solutions that make a real impact.*

 *As we embrace a more interconnected future with our IoT-enabled solutions and our new state-of-the-art office in Helsingborg, we invite passionate individuals to share our vision and be part of something truly transformative.*

### **Our product**


Our digital platform goes beyond traditional filters, providing key insights to optimize performance, reduced costs, and enhance environmental compliance. With a focus on connectivity, our OTC program spans cloud and gateway development, operations, and support, uniting industrial equipment seamlessly. Currently, our IoT-platform boasts a substantial client base and 15+ persons working with Nederman OTC. Looking ahead, we aim to standardize and transition from AWS to Cumulocity and expanding our in-house team with more skilled professionals. Our strategic goals include developing an on-prem IoT solution, connecting diverse industrial applications, and delivering on new platforms.

### **What you will do**


As a Frontend Developer in our team, you will play an important role in contributing to cutting-edge technology and innovation. You will work on developing new products that work across mobile apps, industrial HMIs and browsers, leveraging modern web-frameworks and technologies. Furthermore, you will have the opportunity to set company-wide standards in terms of ways-of-working, technologies employed and usability paradigms. Key tasks include:  



* Cross-functional work to ensure effective collaboration and alignment with project goals.
* Developing and managing well-functioning applications for a dynamic and responsive user interface.
* Contribute to the testing phase to ensure the robustness and quality of the applications.
* Engage in pair programming practices, fostering a collaborative environment and enhancing code quality
* Utilizing modern web framworks to create responsive web-based applications, from conceptualization to deployment.
* Apply Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum, to manage projects efficiently, ensuring iterative development, adaptability to change, and timely delivery.




### **We believe you have**


We are looking for someone with several years of experience of working with front-end-related technologies, preferably Angular. Other technologies and tools that we use are Typescript, CSS, NodeJS, JSON, SQLite, MySQL, TimeScale, PostgreSQL. A keen eye towards good UX design is appreciated, but not a must. Your educational background is not a prerequisite as we are looking for an individual who is curious, willing to delve into various technologies and eager to learn. You are not only curious and passionate about agile development but also embrace challenges with a commitment to quality and meeting targets. For this role, you need to have strong communication skills in English, spoken and written.


We are seeking an individual with self-motivation, flexibility, and resilience, committed to growing with the company in a fast-paced and rewarding global environment. A collaborative approach, positive attitude, and strong work ethic are essential. You must be organized and capable of successfully handling multiple requests and tasks. A can-do attitude with a proactive approach to taking ownership is crucial. Additionally, highly effective listening, organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills are required. If you are ready to take on responsibility and thrive in an environment where you can make a difference, you may be the one we are looking for.




### **What we offer you**


At Nederman, you are part of a fast-growing international company with sustainability at its core, where your work contributes to efficient production, environmental benefits, and safer workplaces worldwide. Our culture is characterized by employees who care for each other and the planet, demonstrating the courage to act. We value continuous learning and offer extensive opportunities for you to develop your skills and knowledge through our global training platform.


At our headquarters in Helsingborg, we are thrilled to have moved into our new world-class facilities. Along with being part of this exciting journey, you will enjoy market-competitive compensation and benefits, including a generous annual healthcare allowance, as well as access to our local canteen, which serves subsidized lunches daily.

### **Apply today**


We are collaborating with Nexer Recruit regarding this recruitment. Please contact recruitment consultant Johanna Värmfors at Johanna.varmfors@nexergroup.com, or +46 730 821 230 or Artan Bitiqi at artan.bitiqi@nexergroup.com, or call +46 723 61 28 44 should you want to learn more about the position. We are looking forward to hearing from you!

### **About Nederman**

*At Nederman, we believe our role is to make life better by creating great products and solutions that protect people, planet and production. With around 2 100 employees, sales offices and distributors in over 50 countries and production in 12 countries on five continents, we´re one of the world's leading companies supplying products and solutions in the environmental technology sector focusing on industrial air filtration. We respect the environment and each other, have the courage to act and a sustainable customer focus. Listed on Nasdaq Stockholm Mid Cap. We are the Clean Air Company.*

title: Frontend Developer at Sindi Index

 Sindi is a pioneering platform that integrates social sustainability into business strategies within the real estate sector. By combining expertise from Brunswick in real estate investments and social sustainability, advanced data analytics, and extensive experience in social sustainability consulting and impact measurement, Sindi offers a unique, objective, and verifiable method to drive both societal and business benefits.

title: Founding Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for an ambitious builder to join the founding team in Stockholm and join our move to San Francisco. We're building an AI powered browser that puts AI into the hands of those who worry about an AI revolution where they get left behind.
 



  





**What we're building & why it will succeed** 



* An AI-powered browser that will help regular people become 10x more capable
* This requires software that gets to know the user over time and predicts their next move
* Think Cursor for non-techies
* The internet will be THE platform for the coming AI Agent revolution, with the browser at its core
* Browsers are ripe for disruption, we're in a small window in time where anything can happen
* We're building a great team, focusing on great execution and taking great risks that others can't



  





**Who we are & what we're looking for** 




 We're a team of 3 serial founders and builders who have spent our entire lives doing crazy ambitious and fun projects and going against expectations. We have a culture of low ego, high positivity, hard work and fast shipping (80/20 mindset). You'll be a great fit if:
 


* You love tackling difficult technical problems that others might shy away from
* You have a bias for action and shipping, but know when to dive deep
* You're energized by ambitious goals and moving fast
* You have strong opinions, held loosely
* You're excited about relocating to San Francisco



  





**What we offer** 




 As one of the first hires, you will have the opportunity to take ownership of our technical projects and personally growing with the company. You will work on mission critical projects that are challenging and exciting. You will work closely with a tight nit team with quick feedback loops and high agency.
 



  





 We're an early stage company and you will be crucial for its success. We compensate accordingly and offer a proper equity stake.
 



  





**Tech Stack** 




 Most of our stack is built it TypeScript.
 


* Frontend -> React
* Backend -> Node
* Cloud -> Supabase, AWS, Vercel

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**About VNTRS:** 




  






 Creating successful companies together with our clients is at the heart and soul of VNTRS.
 





 We believe that too many great ideas fall short due to the wrong reasons – we exist to change that. We are consultants but we don’t consider ourselves as such.
 





 We think that we get the best chances to reach success by becoming partners with our clients and work together as one team.
 




  





  





**Must-have requirements:** 




  






 - At least 6 years of relevant experience building web apps with JavaScript (in both backend and frontend)
 





 - Knowledge of React (or another popular framework such as Vue)
 





 - Knowledge of Express.js (or another popular backend framework such as Nest)
 





 - Willing to produce clean, quality code
 





 - Fluent in English & Swedish
 





 - Pragmatic, Self-acting, and a people person
 




  





  





**About the job:** 




  






 Working at VNTRS as a Fullstack Javascript Developer you can expect a lot of diversity in your daily tasks (coding, advising clients, workshops with startups...). You will be working closely with startups from our portfolio as well as doing missions with external clients.
 




  






 We will actively let you work on both these types of projects to broaden your skillset. Within the assignments, you will be using recent JavaScript technologies, while also being a core part of teams composed of UX/UI designers, product owners, data analysts, and more.
 




  






 Depending on the assignment, your opinion will have a big impact when it comes to the technical solution, but also the scoping of the product itself.
 




  





  





**Nice-to-have requirements:** 





 - Hands-on start-up experience
 





 - Previous consulting experience
 





 - Knowledge of TypeScript
 




  





  





**Additional information:** 




  





*Amazing equity & bonus programme:* 





 All co-workers get the exclusive right to invest in the portfolio of startups that we all work with.
 




  





*New technologies and best practice methodology:* 





 You get to learn how to build successful companies from idea to success by using our 5 steps best practice operational methodology and work with the hottest frameworks in the startup ecosystem.
 




  





*Coaching mindset and mandate to make change:* 





 We believe in a flat organisation where everybody is shaping VNTRS. You will get real responsibility from day one. Together we create a personal development plan based on your career goals and give you the senior support you need to achieve them.
 




  





*Having fun and work-life balance!* 





 At VNTRS we really believe in having fun at work and encourage a healthy work-life balance with a flexible hybrid way of working. Every other Friday we all gather for a social lunch and every other Wednesday breakfast is served - both of which are on the house. At the end of the week we also have a common after-work at the office. We also have two yearly conferences!
 




  





*Generous benefits:* 





 On top of our amazing equity programme, 5000 kr in wellness grant, benefits program through Benify, educational bonus and parental leave top up during 6 months are some of our hidden perks.

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!
 



 We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.
 



 With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.
 



 We are looking for you who is immediate joiner and want to grow with us!
 



 With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.
 



  





**Job Description:** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced 
 **Senior Frontend Engineer**

title: Fullstack-Utvecklare
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 På Segula Technologies IT-avdelning i Stockholm erbjuds du möjligheten att arbeta med innovativa och tekniskt avancerade lösningar. Vi fokuserar på att leverera högkvalitativa tjänster. Som konsult hos oss har du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande kunduppdrag och teamprojekt, där du kan påverka och utvecklas i linje med dina ambitioner. Vi söker nu engagerade och skickliga lokala talanger för att stärka vårt växande team.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Designa, utveckla och underhålla lösningar baserat på verksamhetskrav, icke-funktionella krav och acceptanskriterier.
* Skapa och optimera responsiva e-postmallar, landningssidor samt dynamiska content blocks inom Marketing Automation-plattformen.
* Integrera och använda existerande API:er och systemför att bygga relevant kampanjfunktionalitet.
* Ansvara för testning (inklusive testautomation) och bugghantering.
* Implementera tekniker för personalisering och segmentering av kampanjer.
* Arbeta med prestandaoptimering för e-postmallar och webbsidor.


**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* 4-8 års erfarenhet av fullstackutveckling, med fokus på användarupplevelse, prestanda och backend-utveckling.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av JavaScript och ramverk som React eller Vue.
* Erfarenhet av API-utveckling (SOAP, REST) samt SQL.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av Lean-Agilt arbete (helst SAFe).
* Erfarenhet av Marketing Automation-plattformar och anpassning av kampanjer, e-postmallar och landningssidor.


**Tekniska Kompetenser**
* Frontend: HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Vue, XML/XSLT
* Backend & API: SOAP, RESTful API:er, MSSQL
* Versionshantering: Git, Webpack
* CI/CD & Molntjänster: Azure DevOps, Azure
* Testautomation: Playwright, Selenium, Cypress, Jest (meriterande)
* Säkerhetshantering & loggning (meriterande)
* Marketing Automation & Adobe Campaign Classic v7/v8 (meriterande)


**Personliga egenskaper**
 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är:
   

  

* Du är en samarbetsvillig lagspelare med ett starkt engagemang.
* Du har en analytisk förmåga och förstår komplexa systemflöden.
* Du är strukturerad, självgående och proaktiv.
* Du brinner för kontinuerlig förbättring och innovation.
* Du har pedagogisk förmåga och gillar att dela med dig av din kunskap.
* Du behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.


**Ytterligare information**
 På Segula Technologies värdesätter vi mångfald och strävar efter att skapa en inkluderande arbetsplats. Vi uppmuntrar sökande med olika erfarenheter och bakgrunder. För denna roll krävs att du har ett giltigt arbetstillstånd inom EU. Vi rekryterar löpande, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

**Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt innovativa team i Stockholm!**
 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

title: Frontend Developer, Web Team
company_industry: Financial Services and Technology, Information and Media
description:
MAJORITY is a groundbreaking all-in-one digital financial service app that includes an FDIC-insured account, Visa® Prepaid card, money remittance, and international calling. We are built for migrants, by migrants.
   

 Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are following their dreams, love or new experiences, more and more of us are leaning towards new environments. Our purpose at MAJORITY is to empower the amazing, the brave, and the talented and help them achieve all of their ambitions.
   

 We believe that everyone deserves the same opportunity to succeed. Our mission is to provide migrants the tools to thrive in their new country.
   

 We are a diverse group of people from over 40 different countries that come together every day and we’re looking for others driven by the same desire to create meaningful products that bridge cultural and geographic distances.
   

 MAJORITY is looking for an Experienced Frontend Developer to join its Web team. This is a full time, in-person position based in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

**The role**
 You'll be joining MAJORITY's web team to design, develop, and implement user-facing features primarily for our website and back office application. Your work will focus on creating intuitive and responsive interfaces using modern technologies & frameworks like NUXT3, Vue3, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. Your skills will be crucial in driving the technical architecture and roadmap of our team. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, groom & prioritize deliverables, ensure the quality and performance of the frontend services through clean coding practices. As part of our team, you'll get to work on a diverse spectrum of tasks under the Web space like API integrations, designing components, CMS integrations, Web performance & optimisations. We as a team even take care of our own Devops needs and since we are migrating to Github you will be involved in maintaining and building pipelines using Github actions.
   

**Experience:** 
 5+ years of proven experience in a similar position.
   

**Technical Skills**
* Strong knowledge of and experience with HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, and modern frontend frameworks.
* Experience with responsive and cross-browser web design principles.
* Familiarity with frontend build tools like npm/pnpm/yarn; and experience with unit testing frameworks such as Vitest and Playwright.
* Strong skills in web performance optimization.
* Knowledge of CMS-based web applications.
* Experience working with REST APIs.
* Experience with maintaining, troubleshooting, and optimizing CI/CD pipelines
* GIT expert.


**Design Principles**
* Strong understanding of UX/UI principles, accessibility standards, and attention to detail in rendering designs accurately.
* A keen eye for pixel-perfect implementations across browsers and devices


**Problem-Solving**
* Excellent analytical skills for breaking down complex issues and evaluating solutions effectively.
* Ability to prioritize speed without neglecting quality, understanding that speed is a competitive advantage.
* Ability to reason through trade-offs to make correct decisions for the benefit of the organization.


**Mindset & Work Ethic:**
* Smart, proactive, and outcome-driven – you get things done.
* Ambitious, with a positive attitude and a solution-oriented approach.
* Strong sense of ownership and accountability.
* Eager to learn from others and share knowledge.
* Willing to make decisions, take responsibility, and learn from mistakes.
* Enthusiastic about AI and leveraging AI tools to enhance productivity and innovation.
* Collaboration: Proven ability to communicate and collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and backend developers.
* Communication: Excellent communication skills in English


**Required Skills**
* 5+ years of indepth working experience with HTML5, JavaScript, CSS and modern frontend frameworks like React, Vue or Angular
* Experience with responsive and cross-browser web design principles.
* Strong skills in web performance optimization and frontend build tools.
* Familiarity with testing and debugging frameworks.
* Ability to document technical specifications and collaborate effectively within a team.
* Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.


**Bonus Skills**
* Proficiency in Nuxt, Vue & Tailwind
* Experience with working and integrating GraphQL and DatoCMS
* Good understanding & experience with unit testing
* Experience in maintaining, troubleshooting, and optimizing CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
* Cloud infrastructure skills and platforms such as Azure Devops or GCM
* Knowledge of emerging technologies and best practices in frontend development.
* Experience with .NET development in C#


**What’s in it for you**
* We have a modern technical techstack - Nuxt3 and Vue3
* We have a high pace of development, shipping major new features frequently.
* We have leadership who understands and prioritizes technical work.
* Inclusive and fun office culture


 Looking to be challenged? To work in an environment where your opinions are welcome and you’re constantly learning? To have a real impact on a meaningful project? To work with the latest technologies and to help shape the technology direction of the organization? Then we’d love to hear from you.
   

 We are MAJORITY. We are international, ambitious, kind, and inclusive. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Backend Developer - ML/AI
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
Why VNTRS?
   

  

 By joining VNTRS, you'll be part of an environment that values innovation, partnership, and shared success. We offer significant growth opportunities and the chance to be at the forefront of technological advancements in a collaborative and dynamic setting.
   

  

 Our mission is to transform innovative ideas into successful companies. Unlike typical consultants, we are hands-on partners sharing both risks and successes with our clients. With a dedicated team of over 40 experts in Stockholm, Tallinn, and Helsinki, we are looking to expand our technical prowess by adding a skilled ML Backend developer to spearhead our development projects and contribute to our technological strategy.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a senior Backend developer with experience in Machine learning and DevOps practices.
   

  

 As our ML/AI Backend Developer, you'll play a crucial role in guiding our organization through the fast-changing AI landscape. Working within our Tech Forum, you will collaborate with a dynamic group of more than 20 professionals, including full-stack developers, DevOps engineers, and architects.
   

  

 Location:
   

  

 Stockholm - Hybrid/on-site, not fully remote.

* Design, develop, and implement backend solutions that leverage existing ML/AI technologies to address business problems and enhance product capabilities.

* Work closely with the Head of Tech to align AI initiatives with company objectives

**Meritorious**

**Application**
 If you're ready to play a key role in VNTRS's tech revolution, we want to hear from you. Apply now to contribute to the future success of VNTRS and our clients.

title: Junior Product Developer
description:
**Junior Product Developer** 




 ICANIWILL, also known as ICIW, is a rapidly growing Swedish sportswear company recognized for its functional designs and commitment to quality. We are currently searching for a dedicated and enthusiastic Junior Product Developer, who loves to be active and wants to be part of a dynamic and fast-paced Design & Product team aiming to design and develop the best sportswear products in the world.
 



 This is full time permanent position with placement in Stockholm.
 








**About the role:** 




 As a Junior Product Developer, you work in a dynamic role with the main goal to develop high quality products, you will assist the Product Developer and Pattern Maker and help the team to ensure perfect products in terms of quality, design and purpose of the product. The work tasks include attending fittings, help with commenting on samples, trims, fabrics and lab-dips through Centric PLM system. You will work closely with the whole product and design team as well as the purchasing team.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* To assist the Product Developer and Pattern Maker in the daily work.
* Assist in the making of tech packs and BOMs.
* Assist in checking lab-dips and commenting and communicate to suppliers, together with Product Developer and Design.
* Assist in checking the samples making and help with comments to suppliers.
* Work closely with the design team and product developers to achieve the best product.
* Follow up on inhouse testing.
* Responsible to handle Pre production samples and Shipment samples with support from Pattern Maker/ Product Developer/ Design.
* Responsible for checking and commenting lab-dips.
* Actively engage in fittings and gate meetings throughout the ICIW design process to secure excellent products.
* Support with measuring and checking samples.
* Build and maintain effective working relationships with internal and external partners.



  





**Your skills and qualifications:** 



* Relevant education in textiles, buying or product development.
* Minimum of 1-2 years’ work experience as a Junior or assistant Product Developer role, preferably within functional sportswear or similar.
* A passion for products and product development.
* Excellent material knowledge.
* Driven, structured and proactive in taking initiatives.
* A strong team player with a flexible attitude, comfortable working in a high-paced environment.



  





**About the company** 




 We are a fast growing, online based sports fashion company creating innovative and functional sportswear for men and women. We work in an inspiring, fast-paced environment where new ideas and personal development is valued highly. At ICANIWILL we believe that an environment with both challenges and support from others is the key to success. Therefore, we take great pride in our company culture and make sure to both work hard together and have a lot of fun along the way.
 



  





**How to Apply:** 




 To apply for this exciting opportunity, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your interest and relevant experience to saara.paananen@icaniwill.se 
 



 In the subject line, please include "Jr Product Developer Application."
 



 We will be reviewing applications on a continuous basis and aim to fill the position as soon as possible. If this sounds like the right fit for you, apply now and let's create exceptional things together!

title: Software Engineer
description:
**SSC is a leading, global provider of advanced space services, with more than 50 years of experience. The Satellite Management Service division in SSC is focused on providing high quality and innovative ground station services to our customers - the spacecraft operators. Together we help Earth benefit from Space.**
**What You Will Do**
 We offer the opportunity to join the Software unit within SSC Connect, which is entrusted to develop and maintain critical systems required to connect our customers with their satellites.
   

  

 Our core business is to deliver satellite data to our customers, and the Data Engineering team owns critical components in this process. Their software ensures fast and reliable data delivery, as well as providing great observability for our customers and NMC.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer in the Data Engineering team, you will build and maintain:
   

  

* Systems used for data transfer and observability
* Data pipelines and KPI calculations
* Dashboards and reports


**Who You Are**
 We think that you care – about your systems, your colleagues and your users. That you have a creative and analytical mindset. You take responsibility, drive your own initiatives and can learn and process technical details quickly. We also think that you appreciate both working autonomously and together with other people.
   

  

 You have a European citizenship and can travel within and outside Sweden if needed. As this position is critical to the operations of the SSC Services, it may include outside of standard working hours working and/or being part of an on-call team with up to 1 week on-call per month.
   

  

**What You Need To Know**
* B.S. Computer Science or Computer/Software Engineering, or similar experience
* 2+ years of building and maintaining operationally critical systems
* Experience of implementing dashboard in tools/systems like MS Power BI or Grafana
* Implementation skills in Python, SQL and Flink
* Familiar with Git and Linux Fluency in English


**BONUS POINTS**
* Experience from containerization (e.g., Docker) and orchestration (e.g., Kubernetes)
* Familiar with AWS
* Familiar with Spark
* Experience with message bus technologies like NATS/Kafka
* Experience of DevOps and CI/CD Methodologies
* Experience from the space industry


**WE OFFER YOU**
* An opportunity to be part of the exciting space industry and help Earth benefit from Space.
* An excellent opportunity for personal development and challenging endeavors.
* To be part of international development projects with highly engaged teams.
* A workplace characterized by an open atmosphere and proud employees all over the world.
* Possibility to work remotely part of the time (max 50%), and flexible work hours.


**LOCATION**
 Stockholm or Kiruna.
   

  

**NEXT STEP**
 Does this sound interesting? Interviews are held continuously.
   

  

**WE HELP EARTH BENEFIT FROM SPACE**
 At SSC we help our customers gain access to space. With approximately 600 employees worldwide, SSC offers specialist skills in development, test, launch and operations of different flight and space systems. The Connect division provides satellite services and communications via a global network of our own as well as partner ground stations.
   

  

 Read more at  www.sscspace.com
